articles.author: Pinkvilla Desk
articles.title: Hamilton: First trailer introduces the original Broadway cast of Lin Manuel Miranda’s beloved hip hop musical - PINKVILLA
articles.description: The first trailer of Lin Manuel Miranda’s Pulitzer prize-winning hip hop musical Hamilton features the original Broadway cast. Read on to know more.
